mapper.sql: ID, ADVANCES_NO, CURRENCY_CODE, AMOUNT/100 AMOUNT, VERIFY_AMOUNT/100 VERIFY_AMOUNT, UNVERIFY_AMOUNT/100 UNVERIFY_AMOUNT, CUSTOMER_CODE, CUSTOMER_NAME, APPLY_ORG_CODE, APPLY_ORG_NAME, APPLY_COMPANY_CODE, APPLY_COMPANY_NAME, PAYMENT_ORG_CODE, PAYMENT_ORG_NAME, PAYMENT_COMPANY_CODE, PAYMENT_COMPANY_NAME, ACTIVE, IS_RED_BACK, CREATE_USER_CODE, CREATE_USER_NAME, AUDIT_USER_CODE, AUDIT_USER_NAME, MODIFY_USER_CODE, MODIFY_USER_NAME, DISABLE_USER_CODE, DISABLE_USER_NAME, BUSINESS_DATE, ACCOUNT_DATE, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, DISABLE_TIME, BILL_TYPE, IS_INIT, PAYMENT_TYPE, MOBILE_PHONE, ACCOUNT_NO, PAYEE_NAME, PUBLIC_PRIVATE_FLAG, PROVINCE_CODE, CITY_CODE, BANK_HQ_NAME,BANK_HQ_CODE, BANK_BRANCH_NAME, BANK_BRANCH_CODE, INVOICE_TITLE, LASTPAYMENT_TIME, AUDIT_STATUS, WORKFLOW_NO, STATEMENT_BILL_NO, NOTES, VERSION_NO,CITY_NAME,PROVINCE_NAME, INVOICE_MARK,AUDIT_TIME
mapper.insert: insert into /*结算-预付单-新增空运预付单*/ STL.T_STL_BILL_ADVANCED_PAYMENT (ID, ADVANCES_NO, CURRENCY_CODE, AMOUNT, VERIFY_AMOUNT, UNVERIFY_AMOUNT, CUSTOMER_CODE, CUSTOMER_NAME, APPLY_ORG_CODE, APPLY_ORG_NAME, APPLY_COMPANY_CODE, APPLY_COMPANY_NAME, PAYMENT_ORG_CODE, PAYMENT_ORG_NAME, PAYMENT_COMPANY_CODE, PAYMENT_COMPANY_NAME, ACTIVE, IS_RED_BACK, CREATE_USER_CODE, CREATE_USER_NAME, AUDIT_STATUS, WORKFLOW_NO, STATEMENT_BILL_NO, NOTES, VERSION_NO,CITY_NAME,PROVINCE_NAME,INVOICE_MARK,AUDIT_TIME) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{advancesNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{currencyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}*100, #{verifyAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}*100, #{unverifyAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}*100, #{customerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mapper.update: update /*结算-预付单-更新空运预付单*/ STL.T_STL_BILL_ADVANCED_PAYMENT set ADVANCES_NO = #{advancesNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CURRENCY_CODE = #{currencyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AMOUNT = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}*100, VERIFY_AMOUNT = #{verifyAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}*100, UNVERIFY_AMOUNT = #{unverifyAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}*100, CUSTOMER_CODE = #{customerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUSTOMER_NAME = #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APPLY_ORG_CODE = #{applyOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APPLY_ORG_NAME = #{applyOrgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APPLY_COMPANY_CODE = #{applyCompanyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APPLY_COMPANY_NAME = #{applyCompanyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAYMENT_ORG_CODE = #{paymentOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAYMENT_ORG_NAME = #{paymentOrgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAYMENT_COMPANY_CODE = #{paymentCompanyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAYMENT_COMPANY_NAME = #{paymentCompanyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACTIVE = #{active,jdbcType=CHAR}, IS_RED_BACK = #{isRedBack,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATE_USER_CODE = #{createUserCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_USER_NAME = #{createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AUDIT_USER_CODE = #{auditUserCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AUDIT_USER_NAME = #{auditUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFY_USER_CODE = #{modifyUserCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFY_USER_NAME = #{modifyUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DISABLE_USER_CODE = #{disableUserCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DISABLE_USER_NAME = #{disableUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BUSINESS_DATE = #{businessDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ACCOUNT_DATE = #{accountDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DISABLE_TIME = #{disableTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, BILL_TYPE = #{billType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_INIT = #{isInit,jdbcType=CHAR}, PAYMENT_TYPE = #{paymentType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOBILE_PHONE = #{mobilePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACCOUNT_NO = #{accountNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAYEE_NAME = #{payeeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PUBLIC_PRIVATE_FLAG = #{publicPrivateFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROVINCE_CODE = #{provinceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CITY_CODE = #{cityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BANK_HQ_NAME = #{bankHqName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BANK_HQ_CODE=#{bankHqCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BANK_BRANCH_NAME = #{bankBranchName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BANK_BRANCH_CODE = #{bankBranchCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INVOICE_TITLE = #{invoiceTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LASTPAYMENT_TIME = #{lastpaymentTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, AUDIT_STATUS = #{auditStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WORKFLOW_NO = #{workflowNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATEMENT_BILL_NO= #{statementBillNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOTES = #{notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VERSION_NO = #{versionNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CITY_NAME =#{cityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROVINCE_NAME=#{provinceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AUDIT_TIME=#{auditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

UPDATE /*结算-预付单-修改预付单的对账单单号*/ STL.T_STL_BILL_ADVANCED_PAYMENT SET STATEMENT_BILL_NO=#{statementBillNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},VERSION_NO = VERSION_NO + 1 WHERE ID=#{id} AND VERSION_NO=#{versionNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

UPDATE /*结算-预付单-修改预付单的对账单单号*/ STL.T_STL_BILL_ADVANCED_PAYMENT SET STATEMENT_BILL_NO=#{statementBillNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},VERSION_NO = VERSION_NO + 1 WHERE ID=#{id} AND VERSION_NO=#{versionNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

UPDATE /*结算-预付单-修改预付单的审批状态*/ STL.T_STL_BILL_ADVANCED_PAYMENT SET AUDIT_STATUS=#{auditStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BUSINESS_DATE = #{businessDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, VERSION_NO = VERSION_NO + 1 WHERE ID=#{id} AND VERSION_NO=#{versionNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

UPDATE /*结算-预付单-更新预付单，新增工作流号*/ STL.T_STL_BILL_ADVANCED_PAYMENT TAP SET TAP.VERSION_NO = VERSION_NO + 1, TAP.WORKFLOW_NO = #{workflowNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TAP.MODIFY_USER_CODE = #{modifyUserCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TAP.MODIFY_USER_NAME = #{modifyUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TAP.AUDIT_STATUS=#{auditStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TAP.MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} WHERE TAP.VERSION_NO=#{versionNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND TAP.ID=#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

UPDATE /*结算-预付单-更新预付单的审批结果 审批通过、不通过 */ STL.T_STL_BILL_ADVANCED_PAYMENT TAP SET TAP.VERSION_NO = VERSION_NO + 1, TAP.AUDIT_STATUS = #{auditStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TAP.MODIFY_USER_CODE = #{modifyUserCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TAP.MODIFY_USER_NAME = #{modifyUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TAP.AUDIT_TIME=#{auditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, TAP.MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} WHERE TAP.VERSION_NO=#{versionNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND TAP.ID=#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

UPDATE /* 结算-预付单-审批失败，作废预付单预付单为无效，并设置预付单审核状态为审核不通过*/ STL.T_STL_BILL_ADVANCED_PAYMENT TAP SET TAP.VERSION_NO = VERSION_NO + 1, TAP.ACTIVE = #{active,jdbcType=CHAR}, TAP.AUDIT_STATUS = #{auditStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TAP.MODIFY_USER_CODE = #{modifyUserCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TAP.MODIFY_USER_NAME = #{modifyUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TAP.MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} WHERE TAP.ID=#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND TAP.VERSION_NO=#{versionNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
